Mod.name: Healing Flames
Mod.description:
*Now featuring an altered visual effect while burning (added 11 June 2024).*
With Healing Flames, fire heals all wounds. The challenge with this new power is staying lit. Soaked cloaks are hard to burn, so try to keep dry. Healing Flames also removes the fire protection perk and all fire protection effects from other perks (e.g., oil blood), which prevent ignition. A visual effect (flame shift) was added with the second release. Colors and contrast are shifted a bit while burning. Toggle flame shift on/off and adjust healing rate in settings. Adjustments take effect upon game start. Beware, explosions and lava are good ignition sources, but they still hurt!
Source code: https://github.com/moon9090/Noita_mods/tree/main/healing_flames
